body: It certainly makes a lot of things work out of the box, with "autodetect" setting gopath is no longer needed for usage like "run tests on CI server" (where $HOME is /var/lib/jenkins and you do not want to litter that but keep per-job files to its workspace dir) and building newly downloaded app "just works" (if it have src dir created ofc) even if your "main" dir have some old versions of package
